paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted pathogenic germline BRCA2 mutations and penetrance data from three Japanese patients with gastric cancer.

patients.phenotype: Moderately differentiated tubular adenocarcinoma classified as Lauren intestinal type.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Moderately differentiated tubular adenocarcinoma classified as Lauren intestinal type.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Genetic testing detected a pathogenic frameshift germline mutation in BRCA2 c.89insA (p.L29fs), which was identical to the variant detected in tumor.

functional_data.summary: Pathogenic mutation identified in tumor and germline.

key_quotes: Genetic testing detected a pathogenic frameshift germline mutation in BRCA2 c.89insA (p.L29fs), which was identical to the variant detected in tumor.

patients.phenotype: Mucinous and moderately differentiated adenocarcinoma classified as Lauren intestinal type.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Mucinous and moderately differentiated adenocarcinoma classified as Lauren intestinal type.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Genetic testing detected double pathogenic nonsense germline mutations in BRCA1 c.188T>A (p.L63X) and in BRCA2 c.6922A>T (p.K2308X), which were identical to the variants detected in tumor.

functional_data.summary: Pathogenic mutation identified in tumor and germline.

key_quotes: Genetic testing detected double pathogenic nonsense germline mutations in BRCA1 c.188T>A (p.L63X) and in BRCA2 c.6922A>T (p.K2308X), which were identical to the variants detected in tumor.

patients.phenotype: Poorly differentiated variant of tubular adenocarcinoma classified as Lauren indeterminate type.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Poorly differentiated variant of tubular adenocarcinoma classified as Lauren indeterminate type.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Genetic testing detected a pathogenic nonsense germline mutation in BRCA2 c.9310A>T (p.K3104X), which was identical to the variant detected in tumor.

functional_data.summary: Pathogenic mutation identified in tumor and germline.

key_quotes: Genetic testing detected a pathogenic nonsense germline mutation in BRCA2 c.9310A>T (p.K3104X), which was identical to the variant detected in tumor.

tables_processed.table_caption: Details of Somatic and Germline BRCA1/2 Mutations in Seven Japanese Patients With Gastric Cancer

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants and penetrance data were successfully extracted.
